folder: Richmond Terrace & Arlington Avenue, Staten Island, NY
text:
3260 Richmond Terrace, adjoining the S. E. corner of Arlington Avenue, showing the Captain Garrett Post House (Beers's 1874 map). From 1907 to 1017 it belonged to J. Sterling Drake. The
view is westward.
September 28, 1924
By Wm. T. Davis through P. L. Sperr
title: Richmond: Richmond Terrace - Arlington Avenue
